sentences.sContent: the widespread use of chemicals in agriculture
sentences.sCn: 化学品在农业中的广泛使用

sentences.sContent: ...the widespread use of smartphones all over the world...
...movement out of city centers was widespread and downtown tenants were predominantly made up of the working poor...
...Yet even then reports of widespread youth rebellion were overdone: Most kids in the '60s and 70s shared their parents...
...that had already been freed of widespread discrimination...
...In Africa Africa suffered widespread hunger and starvation through the 70s and 80s...

synos.tran: 普遍的，广泛的；分布广的

remMethod.val: wide(宽广的) + spread(传播， 分布) → 分布广泛的

trans.tranCn: 分布广泛的， 普遍的
trans.tranOther: existing or happening in many places or situations, or among many people
